title: Battlestar Galactica TV Specials x265
description:
Battlestar.Galactica.TVSpecials.x265

THIS TORRENT USES X265 HEVC (High Efficiency Video Coding) VIDEO
PLEASE USE A PLAYER THAT SUPPORTS X265 HEVC VIDEO LIKE VLC, POTPLAYER, ETC

THIS SHARE IS A COLLECTION of 7 TV SPECIALS ABOUT BSG 2003-2009
SOURCES WERE 480P DVD AND 720P AVC ENCODES FROM THE WEB

Battlestar Galactica TV Specials x265: 3hour 11min 29sec 1,376,600,691bytes
Handbrake x64 0.10.3 20160122 x265 HEVC preset=medium
video: 2x 480p crf=21.50 (video ~429Kbps to ~483Kbps)
video: 5x 720p crf=22.25 (video ~749Kbps to ~931Kbps)
audio: 4x 2-channel HE-AAC 96Kbps AND 3x 6-channel HE-AAC 224Kbps

This is an x265 HEVC video, HE-AAC audio collection of 7 TV Specials about the new Battlestar Galactica (2003-2009). 2 TV Specials were sourced directly from the BSG DVDs and 5 others sourced from AVC encodes from the Web. These files have a complete and consistent naming scheme that includes the season#, disc#, file type, title, and a/v details. The TV Specials are ordered by the date of broadcast and include the season-episode point where they should be viewed.

For detailed descriptions of these TV Specials, please see the NFO file for this share:

* BSG.season0.dvd-uk.specials1.TheLowdown.480p.2ch.1subs.x265.20031126.s0e00
>> This encode has optional English subs, had black framing which was removed, and used deinterlace=slower
>> Broadcast just before the BSG Mini-Series Night

* BSG.season1.dvd-us.specials1.TheSeriesLowdown.480p.2ch.1subs.x265.20050114.s1e11-5
>> This encode has optional English subs, had black framing which was removed, and used deinterlace=slower
>> Broadcast just before s1e12 Kobol's Last Gleaming Part1

* BSG.season3.webcap.specials1.TheStorySoFar.720p.6ch.0subs.x265.20060813.s3e00
>> This encode has 5.1 surround sound
>> Broadcast just before s3e01 Occupation

* BSG.season4.webcap.specials1.Revealed.720p.2ch.0subs.x265.20080328.s4e00
>> Broadcast just before s4e01 He That Believeth in Me along with The Phenomenon

* BSG.season4.webcap.specials2.ThePhenomenon.720p.2ch.0subs.x265.20080328.s4e00
>> Broadcast just before s4e01 He That Believeth in Me along with Revealed

* BSG.season4.webcap.specials3.TheTop10ThingsYouNeedToKnow.720p.6ch.0subs.x265.20090111.s4e10-5
>> This encode has 5.1 surround sound
>> Broadcast just before s4e11 Sometimes a Great Notion

* BSG.season4.webcap.specials4.TheLastFrakkinSpecial.720p.6ch.0subs.x265.20090315.s4e18-5
>> This encode has 5.1 surround sound
>> Broadcast just before s4e19 Daybreak

The file names are structured like this:
BSG.season[#]-[disc#].[source].[type#].[title].[resolution].[audio].[#-of-subs].x265

season0-0: The Mini-Series "Night"

dvd-us: NTSC DVD from the US
dvd-uk: PAL DVD from the UK
webcap: An encode from the web sourced from cable TV or streaming websites

Specials also have extra data appended to the file name:
.[date-broadcast].[viewing-order-position]
e.g.: s3e00 is just before s3e01 and s4e10-5 is just before s4e11

Thanks, bsg4you
